name: Neon Omen
description:
WASD to move

E to interact

This is a first person platformer where you play as a criminal with the alias of Neon. You work with your hacker friend Clover for a mysterious benefactor. You get sent out on several missions like blowing up a tower or hijacking a truck. By the way this game takes place in the same universe as my other game Brass and Dust.
